## FileSystem_2.make() method

Make

Create a new disk. Provide a name, root directory, and -- optionally -- a custom glob array. \[ðŸ”— Documentation on bud.disk\](\#)

\#\#\# Usage

```js
fs.set("icons", bud.path("project", "assets/icons"), ["*.svg"]);
```

Signature:

```typescript
make(key: string, options?: {
        baseDir?: string;
        glob?: string[];
    }): FileContainer;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type                                     | Description |
| --------- | ---------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| key       | string                                   |             |
| options   | { baseDir?: string; glob?: string\[\]; } |             |

Returns:

[FileContainer](/api/filesystem/filecontainer)
